column1: # Columns: <subject> <tumor/normal rna> <tumor dna> <project> <cancer type> <cohort for stats>
# Cancer type should be one of the following values used by the immunedeconv R package (see immunedeconv::timer_available_cancers,
# "cesc" Cervical squamous cell carcinoma and endocervical adenocarcinoma
# "hnsc" Head and Neck squamous cell carcinoma
# "dlbc" Lymphoid Neoplasm Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma
